title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practice Competencies: Applying Educational Engineering Research (EER) Theory to Evaluate Instructional Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cases of educational theory application using systematic literature review (SLR) methods.
Learners can evaluate the design and analysis levels of educational interventions using an assessment tool based on the FIETS framework.
Learners can write a literature analysis report to derive theoretical consensus in engineering education research (EER).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
